descriptions.name: Prospecting Probes
descriptions.description: ARC seem to have entered a period of extended probing, sending guarded probes down en masse.

descriptions.name: Harvester
descriptions.description: A mysterious harvesting machine has appeared, heavily guarded by the feared Queen. What kind of riches are to be found within?

descriptions.name: Uncovered Caches
descriptions.description: Storms have unearthed a number of old Raider Caches, but they are rigged to explode should they be exposed for too long. Hurry up and find them all.

descriptions.name: Husk Graveyard
descriptions.description: Something has caused ARC machines to go down on their own in great amounts, leaving husks scattered around the Topside. A better opportunity to gather information and parts has rarely presented itself.

descriptions.name: Launch Tower Loot
descriptions.description: Someone has locked off the Launch Tower, hiding all their hard-earned loot at the top. ARC seems to have ramped up their defenses in response to the heightened activity.

descriptions.name: Lush Blooms
descriptions.description: The weather has been unusually agreeable lately, and vital plants and fruits have been thriving. Get out there and gather your food before it is all gone.

descriptions.name: Night Raid
descriptions.description: Darkness has fallen and the machines lurking in the shadows. High-tier loot can be scavenged for those brave enough to take the riskâ€”but watch your back, the heightened Raider activity has attracted more ARC than usual.

descriptions.name: Electromagnetic Storm
descriptions.description: Lightning strikes batter the surface; frying electronics, disrupting ARC machines, and electrocuting unsuspecting Raiders.

descriptions.name: Hidden Bunker
descriptions.description: Someone has hacked the Outskirts Bunker's security system. Find the 4 buttons to unlock the doors, and be the first to plunder the treasure within.

descriptions.name: Locked Gate
descriptions.description: A clandestine group has activated the Gate's emergency shutdown protocol. 4 key cards need to be obtained to override it, and uncover whatever they're hiding.

descriptions.name: Cold Snap
descriptions.description: A cold front has swept in with snowfall, and a considerable drop in temperature. The air might feel crisp and brisk at first, but beware of frostbite. Candleberry bushes are bearing valuable fruit - they are now ripe for the picking.

descriptions.name: Matriarch
descriptions.description: A Matriarch boss spawns somewhere on the map. Tough fight, big rewards.
